=================
 DataCite v1.0.0
=================

DataCite v1.0.0 was released on February 28, 2018.

About
-----

Python API wrapper for the DataCite Metadata Store API and DataCite XML
generation.

What's new
----------

- Adds full support for DataCite Metadata Schema v4.1 XML generation.

Installation
------------

   $ pip install datacite==1.0.0

Documentation
-------------

   http://datacite.readthedocs.io/

Homepage
--------

   https://github.com/inveniosoftware/datacite

Good luck and thanks for choosing DataCite.
